channel.title: CVE Feed for PrestaShop -- productcomments
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PrestaShop -- productcomments

item.title: CVE-2020-26248|2024-08-04T15:56:04.591Z -- prestashop -- productcomments
item.description: In the PrestaShop module "productcomments" before version 4.2.1, an attacker can use a Blind SQL injection to retrieve data or stop the MySQL service. The problem is fixed in 4.2.1 of the module.

item.title: CVE-2020-26225|2024-08-04T15:49:07.376Z -- prestashop -- productcomments
item.description: In PrestaShop Product Comments before version 4.2.0, an attacker could inject malicious web code into the users' web browsers by creating a malicious link. The problem was introduced in version 4.0.0 and is fixed in 4.2.0
